alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Kittson; Roseau; West Marshall; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 12 at 2:52PM CDT until April 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and heavy snow. Snow accumulations of 5 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...West Polk, Kittson, Roseau, West Marshall and East Marshall Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There will be a sharp cutoff within Polk County where precipitation may remain rain through this evening instead of snow greatly impacting potential accumulations in the east.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Kittson; Roseau; West Marshall; West Polk
